website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for the ultimate quick-fix indoor grill, then you’ll absolutely fall in love with this ultra-fast, compact, and inexpensive model from Hamilton Beach.
pros: Dishwasher safe surfaces and drip tray
Grills most foods within 10 minutes or less
cons: This small model is capable of only grilling up to 4 servings at once

customer_reviews.title: The removable plates are nice, but this cooks better than a Foreman
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with this grill! After wearing out many small Foreman grills I decided to try this one mostly because of the removable plates. This feature IS nice, but I'm mostly impressed with the cooking quality. I only really use this for big thick burgers. The Foreman grills always cooked too fast leaving the inside pink. This grill may take a little longer to get up to cooking heat, but once it's there I just put the burger in, press the lid down to conform to the burger and walk away for 4 minutes. The burgers are perfect every time, cooked uniformly throughout.
customer_reviews.author: LoneGeek

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied with this grill.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Doesn’t meet my needs. I felt it didn’t get hot enough. Meats look unappetizing and veggies take too long to cook. I tried burgers and steak. Pork chops ugh! I donated it because I didn’t use it until it was too late to return it.

customer_reviews.title: Piece broke off after FIRST USE!
customer_reviews.text: RECEIVED IT YESTERDAY! I cannot believe this. I have never had a problem with a Hamilton Beach product. Purchased it to replace Foreman grill. Love the size. Love the way it cooks. Easy to clean. THEN while cleaning I noticed that a piece holding one of the plates had broke off--it's metal. The piece was on platform holding plates so I didn't even have a chance to wipe it off before it broke. USED ONE TIME! What happened? I am not happy that I am going to have to deal with this during a pandemic!
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS GRILL

I've cooked chicken on it and it removes the fat but retains the juices so the chicken does not dry out. You will not be disappointed. THIS IS AN HONEST REVIEW.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grill for the Price

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 4-Serving Electric Indoor, Removable Nonstick Plates, Low Fat Grilling, Black (25357)
product_meta.description: The Hamilton Beach Indoor Contact Grill features a beautiful trendy style and lets you enjoy the taste of grilled food. This portable indoor grill features removable grids, which are completely dishwasher safe making cleaning easy.
feature_bullets: SERVES UP TO 4: 60 square inch surface can grill up to 4 servings at once whether it's hamburgers, hotdogs, or chicken kabobs.
COOKS MORE THAN STEAKS, BBQ AND BURGERS: Grill hot sandwiches, fish, pizza, vegetables, fruit and more. Also great for Paleo and Kato diets.
EASY TO CLEAN: Nonstick plates are removable for easy, dishwasher safe cleaning. A drip tray catches excess grease for easy clean-up.
QUICK COOKING: Cooks most meals in under 10 minutes.
POWER AND READY LIGHTS: Know when it’s time to grill – the ready light will switch on when the grill is at optimal temperature for cooking.
LOW FAT GRILLING: Fat drips away from food as it cooks and goes into the dishwasher safe grease tray.
